about_the_game: The official soundtrack for Shooty Skies, featuring a collection of tracks from the game. Composed by Jacek Tuschewski.
detailed_description:
Track Listing

1) Cute Chaos
2) Don't Shoot the 80s
3) Metal Skies
4) Top Pun Academy
5) The Mad Mad Loops of Shooty


About the Game

The official soundtrack for Shooty Skies, featuring a collection of tracks from the game. Composed by Jacek Tuschewski.

short_description: The official soundtrack for Shooty Skies, featuring a collection of tracks from the game. Composed by Jacek Tuschewski.
